pkgmetadata.longdescription: Seamless Access to World Bank World Development Indicators (WDI) // Access and analyze the World Banks World Development Indicators (WDI) using the corresponding API https://datahelpde sk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/articles/889392-about-the- indicators-api-documentation. WDI provides more than 24,000 country or region-level indicators for various contexts. 'wbwdi' enables users to download, process and work with WDI series across multiple countries, aggregates, and time periods.
